it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn

Interface TurnListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullTurnListener, VirtualTurnView

    public interface TurnListener
    Receives and propagates notifications about events that happen during a turn

    • Method Summary

      • actionDidRequestPlayer

        Player actionDidRequestPlayer(MetaPlayer metaPlayer,
                              java.util.List<Player> legalPlayers,
                              boolean forceChoice)
                       throws UndoException
        Used when requesting Player.
        Parameters:
        metaPlayer - the color on the weapon/powerup.
        legalPlayers - the player available to select.
        forceChoice - condition to loop until valid input is received.
        Returns:
        a player in legalPlayers
        Throws:
        UndoException

                          boolean forceChoice)
                   throws UndoException
        Used when requesting Tile.

        Returns:

      • actionDidRequestCardFragment

        java.lang.Integer actionDidRequestCardFragment(java.lang.Integer cardID,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices,
                                               boolean forceChoice)
                                        throws UndoException
        Used when requesting which specific effect to be used of a weapon.
        Parameters:
        cardID - weaponID
        choices - list of the fragments ids
        forceChoice - boolean used to compel to choose, effectively looping until a valid input is received.
        Returns:
        int corresponding to the fragment chosen
        Throws:
        UndoException - to allow Undo

      • actionDidRequestPayment

        PaymentReceiptData actionDidRequestPayment(PaymentInvoice invoice,
                                           AmmoSet playerAmmos,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> powerUps,
                                           int fragmentToPay)
                                    throws UndoException
        Used when requesting payment.
        Parameters:
        invoice - to be payed.
        playerAmmos - ammoSet of the paying player.
        powerUps - ids of the paying player's powerups
        fragmentToPay - if the payment is for a weapon it's the fragment to be payed, defaults to -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UndoException
